title: Drawing, "Marching Infantry Column", ca. 1862
medium: Graphite, charcoal, brush and white gouache on paper
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a marching infantry column with drummers at left drawn distanctly and a company of soldiers mounted on horses in the distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Marching Infantry Column", ca. 1862.
ca. 1862. Graphite, charcoal, brush and white gouache on paper. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-204-a.
